title: Diuine poems containing the history of [brace] Ionah, Ester, Iob, Sampson : Sions [brace] sonets, elegies / written and newly augmented by Fra. Quarles.
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: Printed by M.F. for I. Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleet-streete,
